title: "LLNL establishes AI Innovation Incubator to advance artificial intelligence for applied science"
excerpt: "Lawrence Livermore National Laboratory (LLNL) has established the AI Innovation Incubator (AI3), a collaborative hub aimed at uniting experts in artificial intelligence (AI) from LLNL, industry and academia to advance AI for large-scale scientific and commercial applications."
